RelatedSentence: [ Monday , May 19 , 2014 ] Pope Francis received in audience the King of Bahrain , His Majesty Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa , who subsequently met with Cardinal Secretary of State Pietro Parolin , accompanied by Archbishop Dominique Mamberti , secretary for Relations with States .

[ Monday , May 19 , 2014 ] Pope Francis received in audience the King of Bahrain , His Majesty Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa , who subsequently met with Cardinal Secretary of State Pietro Parolin , accompanied by Archbishop Dominique Mamberti , secretary for Relations with States .
